entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
